# AddPartyRequest

**Properties**

| Name       | Type | Required | Description                                                             |
| :--------- | :--- | :------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| session_id | str  | ✅       | Internal identifier of a call session                                   |
| party_id   | str  | ✅       | Internal identifier of a party that should be added to the call session |
